scripts.analyze-files: find . -path './node_modules' -prune -o -path './.next' -prune -o -type f \( -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.tsx' -o -name '*.js' -o -name '*.jsx' \) -print -exec wc -l {} \; | awk 'NR%2==1{file=$0} NR%2==0{lines=$1; if(lines>200) printf "%d %s\n", lines, file}' | sort -nr > large-files.tmp && echo '# Files Over 200 Lines' > LARGE_FILES.md && echo '' >> LARGE_FILES.md && echo 'Files that need unit tests before refactoring:' >> LARGE_FILES.md && echo '' >> LARGE_FILES.md && awk '{printf "- **%s** (%d lines)\n", $2, $1}' large-files.tmp >> LARGE_FILES.md && rm large-files.tmp && echo 'Analysis complete! Check LARGE_FILES.md'
